sentences.sContent: Seth was the proud owner of a new sports car.
sentences.sCn: 赛思因为有了新跑车而扬扬得意。

sentences.sContent: ...and they are very proud of the role they played in the company's growth...
...People were always proud to be from Piedmont—lying at the foot of a mountain...
...Britain has started to become really proud of the food it's producing...
...and they are very proud of the role they played in the company’s growth...
...we hope to be the proud owners of the greenhouse...
...We treat them as objects whose appearance and achievements are something we can be proud of...

words.tran: 傲慢地，自负地；得意洋洋地

trans.tranOther: feeling pleased about something that you have done or something that you own, or about someone or something you are involved with or related to
